Create profile for Higher Reach logged in user

request.description:
Create profile
**URL :** `https://j3fz4814s2.execute-api.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/publish`

**Method :** `POST`

**Payload :** 

```json

{
    "action":"record",
    "type":"student",
    "data":{
        "first_name":"Karim",
        "last_name":"Abul Khair",
        "primary_email":"abul.khair@mail.com",
        "date_of_birth":"1995-07-25",
        "primary_contact_number":"01711076585"
    }
}

```

**Response :** 

```json

{
    "action": "record",
    "type": "student",
    "data": {
        "id": "eaa3e5f4-6c9d-4ffd-b4a7-ff091c02c846",
        "first_name": "Karim",
        "last_name": "Abul Khair",
        "date_of_birth": "1995-07-25",
        "primary_email": "abul.khair@mail.com",
        "primary_contact_number": "01711076585"
    },
    "status": "created",
    "message": "new profile created successfully"
}

```
